amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Federal Bureau of Investigation by $6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce appropriations for the Economic Development Assistance Programs by $100,000,000, and increase appropriations for the Federal Bureau of Investigation by $6,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 125 - 294 (Roll no. 721).
